page.title: 15Living in the country
page.content:
I have lived in the country all my life. I like it in the country because it is peaceful. I like to look at the nice{scenery}and I like taking my dog for a walk.
Some people say that it is boring living in the country but I don't agree with them. I like looking at all the{animals and flowers.} We get lots of{birds}in the country.
I wouldn't like to live in the town because it is too noisy and too dirty. You get vandals in towns that break things and spoil them. I think it would be dangerous to go out at night in towns.
Sometimes I wish it wasn't so far to the cinema.
